verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Your name is power, Jesus, Your name is might. Jesus, Your name will break every stronghold, Jesus, Your name is life.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Your name is healing Jesus, Your name gives sight. Jesus, Your name will free every captive, Jesus, Your name is life.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Your name is holy, Jesus, Your name brings light. Jesus, Your name above every other, Jesus, Your name is life.{/lang-eng}
